body: `TensorInfo` is created with `getTensorInfo`, which invokes `getData` (cf `THCTensorTypeUtils.cuh`). So it should be fine.
body_html: TensorInfo is created with getTensorInfo, which invokes getData (cf THCTensorTypeUtils.cuh). So it should be fine.
